qas.question: What threat caused Gordon to publish his article?

answers.text: resumption of work on a railway

qas.question: Who was a diplomat and military officer?
Who had not used the term middle east previously in publications?

context: The threat that caused <a1_0>Gordon<a1_0/>, diplomat and military officer, to publish the article was <a0_0>resumption of work on a railway<a0_0/> from Russia to the Persian Gulf. <a2_0>Gordon<a2_0/>, a published author, had not used the term previously, but he was to use it from then on.
